i.name: Z-Drive Resonance
i.description: Ekko's Zero-Drive charges his spells and attacks with temporal energy. The third hit deals bonus damage and, if the target is a champion, Ekko gains accelerated movement speed.

q.name: Timewinder
q.description: Ekko throws a temporal grenade that expands into a time-distortion field upon hitting an enemy champion, slowing and damaging anyone caught inside. After a delay, the grenade rewinds back to Ekko, dealing damage on its return.

w.name: Parallel Convergence
w.description: Ekko splits the timeline, creating an anomaly after a few seconds that slows enemies caught inside. If Ekko enters the anomaly, he gains shielding and triggers a detonation, stunning enemies by suspending them in time.

e.name: Phase Dive
e.description: Ekko rolls evasively while charging up his Z-Drive. His next attack deals bonus damage and warps reality, teleporting him to his target.

r.name: Chronobreak
r.description: Ekko shatters his timeline, becoming untargetable and rewinding to a more favorable point in time. He returns to whenever he was a few seconds ago, and heals for a percentage of the damage received in that duration. Enemies near his arrival zone take massive damage.

riot.name: Z-Drive Resonance
riot.description: Ekko's Zero-Drive charges his spells and attacks with temporal energy. The third hit deals bonus damage and, if the target is a champion, Ekko gains accelerated movement speed.

i1.name: Z-Drive Resonance
i1.blurb: Ekko's Zero-Drive charges his spells and attacks with temporal energy. The third hit deals bonus damage and, if the target is a champion, Ekko gains accelerated movement speed.
i1.description:
{{sbc|Resonance:}} '''Ekko's''' [[basic attack]]s and [[damage|damaging]] [[Champion ability|abilities]] apply ''Resonance'' to affected enemies for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.
At 3 stacks, ''Resonance'' is consumed to deal {{pp|30;40;50;60;70;80 to 140|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to the target, doubled to {{pp|30*2;40*2;50*2;60*2;70*2;80*2 to 140*2|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 160% AP)}} against {{tip|monsters}}, but capped at 600.
i1.description2: {{sbc|Stolen Time:}} If '''Ekko''' triggers ''Resonance'' against enemy {{tip|champions}}, he also gains {{pp|4|key=%|50 to 80|1 to 16|displayformula = 50%+10% every 5 levels|color=movement speed}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{pp|3|2 to 3|1 to 11}} seconds.
i1.description3: {{sbc|Stabilized:}} ''Resonance'' cannot affect the same target more than once every few seconds.
i1.customlabel: {{tt|On-Target Cooldown|This is not affected by cooldown reduction. Begins after the stacks are consumed}}

riot.name: Timewinder
riot.description: Ekko throws a temporal grenade that expands into a time-distortion field upon hitting an enemy champion, slowing and damaging anyone caught inside. After a delay, the grenade rewinds back to Ekko, dealing damage on its return.
riot.tooltip: Ekko throws a device that deals {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage to enemies it passes through. It expands into a slowing field on the first champion hit, slowing everything inside by {{ e2 }}%. It then returns to him after a delay, dealing {{ e3 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a2 }})</scaleAP> magic damage to all targets hit upon return.

q1.name: Timewinder
q1.blurb: Ekko throws a temporal grenade that expands into a time-distortion field upon hitting an enemy champion, slowing and damaging anyone caught inside. After a delay, the grenade rewinds back to Ekko, dealing damage on its return.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ekko''' throws a device in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies along its path.
q1.description2: After traveling 900 units or upon hitting an enemy champion, the device slows down for {{fd|1.75}} seconds, expanding by 50 units and continuing in its direction for another 175 units while also creating a ''Temporal Sickness'' field that {{tip|slow|slows}} nearby enemies.
q1.description3: After finishing its path, the device contracts and returns to '''Ekko''' at a higher speed, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies along its path.
q1.description4: ''The traveling and returning device cannot damage the same enemy more than once.''
q1.leveling3: {{st|Returning Magic Damage|{{ap|40 to 140}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|60+40 to 120+140}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}}}
notes: * {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block only a single instance of damage.

riot.name: Parallel Convergence
riot.description: Ekko splits the timeline, creating an anomaly after a few seconds that slows enemies caught inside. If Ekko enters the anomaly, he gains shielding and triggers a detonation, stunning enemies by suspending them in time.
riot.tooltip:
Passive: Ekko's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage to enemies under 30% health equal to {{ e3 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of their missing health. Deals a minimum of {{ e6 }} damage, and a maximum of {{ e5 }} damage vs. minions and monsters.

Active: After a 3 second delay, Ekko creates a short-lived chronosphere at the target location that slows enemies who enter by {{ e0 }}%. If Ekko enters the sphere, he will detonate it, gaining a shield that absorbs up to {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for 2 seconds. Enemies caught inside are stunned for {{ e2 }} seconds.

w1.name: Parallel Convergence
w1.blurb: Ekko splits the timeline, creating an anomaly after a few seconds that slows enemies caught inside. If Ekko enters the anomaly, he gains shielding and triggers a detonation, stunning enemies by suspending them in time.
w1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Ekko's''' basic attacks deal {{as|3% {{as|(+ 3% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''missing''' health|health}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} to targets below {{sti|health|{{as|30% of their '''maximum''' health}}}}. The damage has a minimum threshold of 15 and is capped at 150 against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}.
w1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ekko''' calls upon an alternate version of himself that bats a device to the target location. After a total delay of 3 seconds, the device expands into a broad sphere that {{tip|slow|slows}} enemies by 40%, only revealing itself to enemies in the last 1 second.
w1.description3: If '''Ekko''' enters the sphere within the next {{fd|1.5}} seconds after it lands, it detonates, {{tip|shield|shielding}} him for 2 seconds, meanwhile {{tip|stun|freezing}} any enemies within in time for {{fd|1.75}} seconds. '''Ekko''' can detonate the sphere even while {{tip|untargetable}}.
notes: * ''Parallel Convergence's'' active provides {{tip|sight}} in its radius 2 seconds after cast and for as long as the {{tip|slow|slowing}} field is active.
* If '''Ekko''' is shielded by the sphere, he receives the buff ''Seen It All Before'': "Ekko has already seen this timeline and is able to avoid some incoming damage".
* Enemies affected by the stun receive the debuff ''Temporal Suspension'': "The unit is frozen in time. WARNING: Avoid the detonation radius of temporal anomalies."

riot.name: Phase Dive
riot.description: Ekko rolls evasively while charging up his Z-Drive. His next attack deals bonus damage and warps reality, teleporting him to his target.
riot.tooltip: Ekko dashes a short distance in the targeted direction. His next attack will deal {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> bonus magic damage and teleport him to his target.

e1.name: Phase Dive
e1.blurb: Ekko rolls evasively while charging up his Z-Drive. His next attack deals bonus damage and warps reality, teleporting him to his target.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ekko''' {{tip|dashes}} towards the target location, giving him ''Primed''.
e1.description2: ''{{sbc|Primed:}}'' '''Ekko's''' next basic attack has {{sti|range|300 '''bonus''' range}}, deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, and causes him to {{tip|blink}} to his target. The {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} is classified as [[ability damage]].

riot.name: Chronobreak
riot.description: Ekko shatters his timeline, becoming untargetable and rewinding to a more favorable point in time. He returns to whenever he was a few seconds ago, and heals for a percentage of the damage received in that duration. Enemies near his arrival zone take massive damage.
riot.tooltip: Ekko turns back time, going briefly untargetable and invulnerable. He teleports to where he was 4 seconds ago and deals {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage to nearby enemies on arrival. Additionally, Ekko heals for {{ e3 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a2 }})</scaleAP>, increased by {{ e5 }}% for each 1% of his health lost over the last 4 seconds.

r1.name: Chronobreak
r1.blurb: Ekko shatters his timeline, becoming untargetable and rewinding to a more favorable point in time. He returns to whenever he was a few seconds ago, and heals for a percentage of the damage received in that duration. Enemies near his arrival zone take massive damage.
r1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} While ''Chronobreak'' is not on cooldown, '''Ekko''' is followed by a time-delayed hologram of himself that tracks where he was 4 seconds ago.
r1.description2: {{sbc|Active - Broken Timeline:}} After {{fd|0.75}} seconds, '''Ekko''' {{tip|blink|travels}} to his hologram's location, becoming {{tip|untargetable}} during the transportation, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to surrounding enemies on arrival and {{tip|healing}} himself.
r1.leveling2: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|150 to 450 3}} {{as|(+ 150% AP)}}}}{{st|Self-Heal|{{ap|100 to 200 3}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}} (+ 3% ''per {{as|1% of health}} lost in the past 4 seconds'')}}
r1.description3: Using ''Chronobreak'' to go through {{ai|Parallel Convergence|Ekko}} will trigger its {{tip|shield}} and {{tip|stun}}.
notes: * The [[Nexus Obelisk]] can still attack '''Ekko''' during the transportation.
